721556f-a.text:
408 to 414 (3-story house with Burke Bros. sign on it) Madison Street, south side, west of, adjoining and at its point of confluence with Grand Street. Also shown are Nos. 575 to 581 (from 2-story house with sign covering its second floor windows, leftward) Grand Street, south side, at, adjoining and east of its point of confluence with Madison Street.
March 26, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
721556f-a.folder: Madison Street & Grand Street, Manhattan, NY
